casebody.data:
Wednesday, December 23, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

98-2531. Natl. City Bank v. Beyer.

Huron App. No. H-98-006. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and cross-appeal. Upon consideration of the motion of appellant, state of New Jersey, for stay of court of appeals’ judgment,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied.

Resnick, J., not participating.
